subject: Need update for order #SSN1891
description_text:
Hello
Please send me the update and tracking number for the products ordered
on 6/29/2025, I have requested expedited service and made the payment.
Kindly check the status of this order as I need these products asap.
kind regards

Sadeeya Zaidi
3614 Amer Way El Dorado hills CA 95762

conversations.body_text: Hi，Sadeeya Z，  The VAM motor, handbrake, and sequential shifter have all been shipped. The pedals are still awaiting arrival and stocking at the U.S. warehouse, which is expected to take a few more days.

Hello
For the products that you have already shipped to my address please send
the tracking info;
I was charged the extra amount for expedited shipping but it has not been
processed as priority.
For the pedals that are awaiting shipment I would prefer to change the
shipping address  to india .
Please send me the tracking info for the package that is shipped to my
California  address.

On Wed, Jul 2, 2025 at 12:19 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Sadeeya Z,     Sorry for the delay, the latest batch arrived today and we have dispatched it for you and expect it to arrive around the 9th.
